home.home-descripcion: I am passionate about programming and learning new technologies.
home.home-frase: If you can imagine it, you can program it.

about.about-descripcion-one: Hi, I'm Hilder Rody Huancas Chuquipoma, I'm a Systems Engineering student, currently I work as a frontend web developer, but I also have knowledge in backend. I am a resolute person, with the ability to adapt to teams and eager to keep learning new technologies.
about.about-descripcion-two: In my adventure in the world of web development, I have been involved in different projects related to the web, taking on new challenges and learning new strategies to correct errors that may arise when developing websites.
